summary: HEAD LIGHT SWITCH OVER HEATED SINCE THE CAR WAS NEW. GETS UNCOMFORTABLY WARM TO THE TOUCH.  BLOWER SPEED SWITCH OVER HEATED, MELTED INTERNAL PLASTIC BASE SO FAN SPEED COULD ONLY BE SET AT TOP 2 SPEEDS. UPON REMOVAL FOR REPAIR FOUND THE POWER TERMINAL HAD ALSO OVER HEATED THAT THE COPPER WAS DISCOLORED AND THE PLASTIC INSULATION ON MATING CONNECTOR HAD BEGUN TO MELT AND DEFORM. ****DIMSII  IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****739799.  *AK *JB
